Description: Two small fragment of an amulet showing a right wedjat eye, not clear if they are from one or two amulets. The base is flat, the upper is textured in relief, made of vivid blue faience. Only the middle part with pupil and the stroke is preserved.
Dimensions: Height: 1.15 centimetres (Measurement refer to larger fragment)
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
